TopicTitle: Fanmade Map of the whole Kerbin planet

Articles.Content: I just heard of the kerbaltic sea and ect. wish someone could just make a map of the whole planet(not the ISA MapSat). A map the shows the name of seas and mountain ranges in kerbin. give me the link if there is one already

We're currently tossing together data from ISA MapSat to make a large high res raster map. (Sorry for my being distracted and not putting up what we have so far guys! >.< ) It should actually be (sorta) easy to tweak the colour map so it provides a view that's more like a simple 2-D map without major elevation data.

Putting in the names of things would just require some photoshopping. Or GIMPing. Whatever.
